list.description:
Remade the sights of RideR2 (https://live.warthunder.com/post/798637/en/) for the Fiat 6614 and R3 106 (M40A1 recoilless rifle) (M50 and the T114 have the same gun but their sight has no issue)

The numbers were so wrong I couldn't use the sight.


#106 #recoilless_rifle #Fiat #6614 #R3 #realistic #sight

Довольно фановый прицел, не имеющий поправок по дальности, дабы не нарушить всю суть его. А на этому всё. Если возникнут вопросы/проблемы/пожелания на исправление каких-то недоработок в угоду правильного функционирования - пишите в комментариях.
#universal #sight #sniper #fun

# t55 # t55a # t54 # t54_1947 # t54_1951 # t54_1949

Reticle for T-54 all years and T-55A .

Features:

Outwardly similar to PSO-1

Besides, I was too lazy to do any special functions (as in the case of Vickers), so the scope is simple

How to install: Go to the game folder and unpack the archive into the UserSights folder - if it is not there, you need to create it.

Wishes, tips, requests - write in the comments.

Модифицированная версия прицела: https://live.warthunder.com/post/947415/en/
Деления каждые 10 метров вместо 25 для удобства использования.
Увеличен центральный круг для увеличения заметности.
Оригинальный прицел был с поправками - математически применены поправки для десятичных делений.

English description:
Modified version of a sight from here: https://live.warthunder.com/post/947415/en/
Marks each 10 meters instead of 25 for convenience.
Larger central circle for better visibility.
Original sight included distance correction - it was mathematically applied to ...

Прицел сделан на основе снайперской прицельной сетки, но взят из моих фантазий)) В общем, универсальный. Если возникнут вопросы/проблемы/пожелания на исправление каких-то недоработок в угоду правильного функционирования - пишите в комментариях. Ну, а на этом всё.
Обновлено:

Исправлена вертикальная риска, когда дублировался показатель «20».


#universal #sight #sniper

#historical #ztz96a #ztz96 and maybe #ztz99
Edit: This also includes a rangefinder sight, its labeled clearly.
Historical auxiliary gunners sight based on http://btvt.info/3attackdefensemobility/fcs_mbt2000.files/image029.jpg
-Range marks have been adjusted to fit war thunders ballistics (except for 30 and 32 marks for HEAT [AH] and 40 mark for HE due to limitations)
-I have absolutely no clue what AH meant so I used its range marks for the HEAT projectile they all get.
-(Note before using the sight you have to add a grid sight in the options>use alternative sights grid menu)
-To use si...
this two sights is for all tank ,

# centurion_mk_3 #centurion # centurion_mk3 # strv_81 # strv81

Reticle for Centurion 3 and Strv 81.

Features:

For a sub-caliber projectile, the fall time is shown

In the upper part of the sight - distance markers up to 8400m

White backlight (Very clearly visible on gray cards)

P.s. The markup on the right and bottom of the screen has no meaning))


How to install: Go to the game folder and unpack the archive in the UserSights folder - if it is not there, you need to create it.

Wishes, advice, requests - please in the comments.

#eland # eland_90 # eland_90_mk7 # eland_mk_7 #aml # aml90 # aml_90

Reticle for Åland and AML 90.

Features:

There are marks for an approximate measurement of the distance to the target by the height of the tank. (3 and 4 screens - who does not understand)

White backlight (Very clearly visible on gray cards)

How to install: Go to the game folder and unpack the archive in the UserSights folder - if it is not there, you need to create it.

Wishes, advice, requests - please in the comments.

#vikers #mbt #vikers_mbt #vikersmki #vickers #vickers_mbt #vickersmbt

Reticle for Vickers mbt.

Features:

For a sub-caliber projectile, the fall time is shown

In the upper part of the sight - distance markers up to 8400m

White backlight (Very clearly visible on gray cards)

P.s. The markup on the right and bottom of the screen does not carry any semantic meaning))


How to install: Go to the game folder and unpack the archive in the UserSights folder - if it is not there, you need to create it.

Wishes, advice, requests - please in the comments.

SPAA+ sight
Credit for the original sight goes to WOJTEK885_

Edit 1 I've added a new version of the sight (Screenshot 4) to the archive, which looks slightly nicer since the range numbers no longer overlap with the inner circle, the old version is still in the archive for those who might want it.

This is an absolute frankensight made from a sight of my own and a modified AA sight from wojtek.
After playing some games with the og sight I've felt that it's pretty cool but I didn't like certain areas of it - so I've swapped some things around and added some ot...

Remade the M36 sight of RideR2 (https://live.warthunder.com/post/677866/en/), because the numbers were displaced.

It's not as nice as his, but now it's a bit easier to read.


#M36 #realistic

Made a hopefully realistic enough sight for the T55E1

Sources used:

picture: http://www.theshermantank.com/wp-content/uploads/m70frecticle75mmsherman.png

realistic sight mod of RideR2: https://live.warthunder.com/post/677866/en/
He made awesome sights for almost all countries, but sadly stopped working on them

#realistic #t55e1

Sight for IS-2 (1944) for simulator battles. Features APHEBC (BR471B).

This sight works for several vehicles:
• IS-2 (1944)
• IS-2 "Revenge"
• (Chinese) IS-2 mod.1944
...

# 2a6 # leopard2a6 #leopard # leopard2 # leopard2a

Reticle for leopard 2a6.

Features:

Unusual sight color + yellow illumination.

Rangefinder and distance correction scale are close

How to install: Go to the game folder and unpack the archive in the UserSights folder - if it is not there, you need to create it.

Wishes, advice, requests - please in the comments.

Предлагаю пакет универсальных прицелов с темой ВМВ и для современных танков. Подходят всем танкам, под все режимы боев. Прицел для БР 1.0...7.7 имеет варианты основного цвета черный и белый (_B и _W), современный - основной зеленый, подсветка на всех прицелах голубая. Для установки откройте архив и положите папку all_tanks в папку UserSights в папке с игрой. Выберете нужный прицел в игре когда активен ваш танк (ангар, пробник, бой)

Schindibee's fictional "SCOLIA" Sight package for 75mm Pvkan m/43 Family

#customsight #sight #fictional #scolia #75mm #pvkv_m43_1963 #pvkv_m43_1946 #mdelat_torn #strvm42dt

This is a fully fictional sight package for the Swedish Pansarvärnskanon m/43 canon armed tanks, including the following easy to use features:

- Simplified ranging scale for main ammo
- Ranging funnels configured for tank lengths of 7m (full line) and width of 3.5m (dotted line)
- Deflection shooting aim crosses for targets traveling at 20 km/h (inner) and 40 km/h (outer)
- Additional scales for se...

Sights for KV-1 (ZiS-5) and KV-1S for simulator battles. Feature APHEBC (BRO350B) as well as smoke shells.

#sb #sim #simulator #simulatorbattles #kv1s #kv1zis5

Schindibee's fictional "SCOLIA" Sight package for 76mm M7 Family

#customsight #sight #fictional #scolia #76mm #m6a1 #m10 #m10_gmc #wolverine #t55e1

This is a fully fictional sight package for 76mm M7 canon armed tanks, including the following easy to use features:

- Simplified ranging scale for main ammo
- Ranging funnels configured for tank lengths of 7m (full line) and width of 3.5m (dotted line)
- Deflection shooting aim crosses for targets traveling at 20 km/h (inner) and 40 km/h (outer)
- Additional scales for secondary and tertiary ammo (37mm AP and HE for the ...

Improved Sturmpanzer II Sight (15cm sIG 33 B Sfl)

#sturmpanzer_ii #15cm #15cm_sig_33_bsfl #fictional #15cmsig33bsfl #rangefinder
Copy folder UserSights into your main Warthunder root folder
Go to Testdrive
Press Alt + F9
Go to options -> Common Battle Settings -> Use alternative Sight Grid

Features

  • finer distances
  • standiametric Rangefinder
  • width Markers based on T-44

Sight on leopard 2a5. In fact, if it fits any tank if you transfer it to another folder.
How to install: Go to the game folder and unpack the archive in the UserSights folder - if it is not there, you need to create it.
The sight has a yellow illumination.
P.S. Translation level - google translate

Close copy of the warfare 2077 sight used in the April fools gamemode#
#2077
Thanks to all the commenter who told me how to change the color of the sight
The default color is green, and the lighting color is magenta

Sight for AMX-13 (75mm) and AMX-13 (SS.11) for simulator battles. Features APCBC.

...

Sight for AMX-13 (FL11) for simulator battles. Features APCBC.

#sb #sim #simulator #simulatorbattles #amx13fl11

video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tu9oBR13Ebk&list=PLXIirS3OlzWOKDOo5ath9-vgv8DnjjFar&index=11

Sight for the USSR tank ISU-122S.

#isu_122, #isu_122s, #isu, #ussr_tank, #ussr, #usa, #cemen_054, #cemeh_054, #054

Description:
In the sight, the projectile penetration can be viewed depending on the selected distance. And also the flight time for this distance. So in battle, you can understand what kind of lead to take and whether the projectile can penetrate the target.

Friends, now you can support the development of sights for any amount.
https://www.donationalerts.com/r/cemeh_0...
